Key Match Events: Indonesia scored a penalty in the 40th minute to take the lead
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Philippe Troussier expressed disappointment about the defeat and mentioned a small mistake as the reason
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vietnam missed their star Nguyen Dinh Bac in this game due to injury
Others: Indonesia squad, with players that have better physique, often won in one on one situations and committed many fouls
They were pressing Vietnam right from the start looking for an early goal
In the second half, Vietnam made two substitutions and had several chances to score, but their shots still lacked accuracy against very solid defense
